title: Test your knowledge on vaccines and immunization and donate a vaccine to someone in need
description: Please take a quizz on iboostimmunity.com.
cleaned_text: Test your knowledge on vaccines and immunization and donate a vaccine to someone in need Please take a quizz on [iboostimmunity.com](https://iboostimmunity.com/). Firstly you will have fun and learn interesting facts on vaccines and immunization, and secondly, for each piece of content you share or quiz question answered correctly there is one vaccine donated to UNICEF Canada !
